hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Bow#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Market# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: Having trouble defeating Dark Link?^Look away from him while holding Z-Target and then when Dark Link walks up behind you, strafe sideways and slash your sword.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #the Forest Temple# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of #gold#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #3# major items.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #a Deku Stick#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Strength Upgrade#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Ice Cavern#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##the Market## has #0# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Climb East Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Bottom of the Well#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: Next you'll say:^"Why am I still reading these?"
